item.description:
Let's start 2010 off right! Join us this month and make the connections that you need to grow your business in 2010. Be prepared to tell the group who your ideal client is and how we can help you make the referrals and connections you need to make this year!

This month we are going to tackle money issues! We are going to talk openly and honestly about where our money stories come from and how we can change them. We will examine how to move into a mindset that allows us to attract more money into our lives. I have a great set of questions for us to discuss as a group. It will be a wonderful experience. Hope you can join us!

Scrumptious appetizers will be served and cash bar available!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the main ballroom.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE To Be Phenomenal January Networking Event
